item.title: 13.1 Map
item.description: The Map page in the Distributor page helps businesses or dealers easily check and track their fleet of equipment. Enable display by default | Sub-accounts | Favourite Group by Default | Group | Geographical area Display up to 200 devices To access click on Distributor > Map. The remaining functions are similar to 4. Map

item.title: 13.2 Business
item.description: Page Business same function as page 12.3 Business To access click on Distributor > Business.
